body_html: @pawni If you don't want to worry about about updating moving_mean and moving_variance set updates_collections=None to make sure they are updated in place, otherwise you need to make sure the update_ops added to tf.GraphKeys.UPDATE_OPS are run during training.
body_text: @pawni If you don't want to worry about about updating moving_mean and moving_variance set updates_collections=None to make sure they are updated in place, otherwise you need to make sure the update_ops added to tf.GraphKeys.UPDATE_OPS are run during training.
body: @pawni If you don't want to worry about about updating moving_mean and moving_variance set updates_collections=None to make sure they are updated in place, otherwise you need to make sure the update_ops added to tf.GraphKeys.UPDATE_OPS are run during training.
